page.title: 18Grundisburghs Soc. Concerns
page.content: Expressed Social Concerns include: Health - The provision of a purpose equipped Doctors' Surgery. Education - A satisfactory outcome to an area review of schools and the continued satisfactory provision of Education and Educational facilities. The Elderly and Those Alone - Adequate home care. Communications - Provision of additional Public Telephone. Transport - Provision of additional footpaths; speed of vehicles; improved provision of 'buses. Law and Order - Provision of a resident Policeman in order to maintain the low level of vandalism etc. Village Life and Environment - The need to maintain both the nature and beauty of the village and the quality of life.
